author: jleroux
msg: A patch from Shi Jinghai "out of range index exception in ShoppingCart.getAdjustmentPromoIndex()" https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/OFBIZ-4720
This has obviously never been tested. Incrementing a positive or 0 value with only a test on being > 0 can only end with and out of range index exception :/
